dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, have you seen this news about Kaspi.kz? Pretty big deal, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, have you seen this news about Kaspi.kz? Pretty big deal, actually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! The one where they're like, Kazakhstan's leading e-commerce company again? For the fifth year in a row, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! The one where they're like, Kazakhstan's leading e-commerce company again? For the fifth year in a row, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is the fifth year in a row that Kaspi.kz has been recognized as Kazakhstans leading e-commerce company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Fifth year! I mean, that's some serious consistency, um, in a really competitive market.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Fifth year! I mean, that's some serious consistency, um, in a really competitive market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And they actually, like, thanked their clients and partners for it, which is, uh, nice to see.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And they actually, like, thanked their clients and partners for it, which is, uh, nice to see.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thank you to each of our clients and partners for being with us!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, totally. And when you look at the numbers, it's pretty wild. Twelve million customers...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally. And when you look at the numbers, it's pretty wild. Twelve million customers...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] And almost two and a half million products! That's, like, a whole mall online.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And almost two and a half million products! That's, like, a whole mall online.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Plus, they're offering, you know, the best possible prices *and* free delivery. That's a huge draw.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Plus, they're offering, you know, the best possible prices and free delivery. That's a huge draw.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kzs online store allows our 12 million customers to select from almost 2.5 million products, at the best possible prices, with free delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. But what I also found really interesting is how they support, um, local businesses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. But what I also found really interesting is how they support, um, local businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. Mikhail Lomtadze, the CEO, he mentioned how they help small and medium-sized businesses reach new customers, grow, and even create jobs. That's a big impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. Mikhail Lomtadze, the C E O, he mentioned how they help small and medium-sized businesses reach new customers, grow, and even create jobs. That's a big impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our merchants, must of whom are local small and medium-sized businesses, we help them reach new customers, grow their businesses and create jobs, commented Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's a really important part of, uh, their ecosystem, isn't it? Not just being a platform, but also a growth engine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's a really important part of, uh, their ecosystem, isn't it? Not just being a platform, but also a growth engine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And it's not just some internal award either. This is the 'Top KZ Retail E-Commerce' ranking from Forbes Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And it's not just some internal award either. This is the 'Top K Z Retail E-Commerce' ranking from Forbes Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Top KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is prepared annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with international consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, with Baker Tilly Kazakhstan, the consulting company. And it's specifically based on online sales revenue, which is, uh, a pretty solid metric.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, with Baker Tilly Kazakhstan, the consulting company. And it's specifically based on online sales revenue, which is, uh, a pretty solid metric.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Top KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is prepared annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with international consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan. The ranking is based on revenue from online sales.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So it's pure, like, performance-driven. Not just, you know, brand recognition or anything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So it's pure, like, performance-driven. Not just, you know, brand recognition or anything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it shows they're really delivering. Five years running, that's, uh, that's quite an achievement. They've really nailed it in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it shows they're really delivering. Five years running, that's, uh, that's quite an achievement. They've really nailed it in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. A dominant force, for sure. Props to Kaspi.kz!
